meanings.definition: A straight line used to define a conic section.
meanings.sent1: The directrix of the parabola determines its shape.
meanings.sent2: The mathematician drew the directrix to create the curve.
meanings.sent3: The directrix of the ellipse decided to take a break and relax.
meanings.sent4: Her guidance was like a directrix, leading us through the maze of equations.
meanings.sent5: The directrix stood out boldly against the backdrop of the graph.

meanings.sent1: The directrix of the company made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: She was the directrix of the award-winning film.
meanings.sent3: The directrix organized a surprise party for her team.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was strong and decisive, like a directrix.
meanings.sent5: The directrix's vision shaped the future of the organization.
